channel.title: CVE Feed for Lodel Geraldo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lodel Geraldo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49613|2024-10-21T19:08:26.765Z -- lodel%20geraldo -- simple%20code%20insert%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Lodel Geraldo Simple Code Insert Shortcode allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Simple Code Insert Shortcode: from n/a through 1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-49613|2024-10-20T10:00:05.065Z -- lodel%20geraldo -- simple%20code%20insert%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Lodel Geraldo Simple Code Insert Shortcode allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Simple Code Insert Shortcode: from n/a through 1.0.
